title: Spectating
body:
Thanks, again, Riot. I love when you remove the Featured Game panel that makes spectating easy. 
New Champ released? Might like to see him in a few games? Nah too bad. We need to talk about something to do with Bard in that panel. Coulda taken another panel? Nah, we NEED that "LCS PREVIEW" panel, need it real bad. Couldn't have featured games cycling through like normal. 

May as well make an announcement and just say you're removing the spectate feature from the client. At least that way I don't expect it to be there and just get disappointed, every, freaking, time.
